item.title: Kashi CTF 2025 : kings | OSINT
item.description: Clues: A photograph of a dagger/knife. The title “Kings” in plural, suggesting the challenge will involve multiple kings. The statement: “cosmic weapons” “example of such weapons on the net” “This ruler’s court artist” “drew the most accurate painting of a now extinct bird” Approach: Reverse Image Search: A reverse image search reveals that this dagger, made of cosmic materials, belonged to Tutankhamun, an Egyptian king. Research on the Extinct Bird:
